arts.ttl: Initial reaction from Gary Rowett after U’s draw at Canaries
arts.sum: GARY Rowett was proud of the ‘really determined performance’ his Oxford United players put in to claim a draw at Sky Bet Championship play-off hopefuls Norwich City.

arts.ttl: 'Didn't play like a team' - Norwich fans react to Oxford draw
arts.sum: Watch Norwich City fans react to the Canaries' 1-1 Championship draw with Oxford United at Carrow Road.

arts.ttl: Sargent strikes again but Norwich's play-off hopes hit by Oxford draw
arts.sum: Norwich failed to make the most of a dream start as they were held to a 1-1 draw by Oxford in a hard-fought Sky Bet Championship clash at Carrow Road.

arts.ttl: Norwich’s play-off hopes take a knock as Oxford hit back to draw
arts.sum: Josh Sargent gave the hosts the lead at Carrow Road but Mark Harris levelled for Oxford.

arts.ttl: MATCHDAY LIVE: Norwich City v Oxford United
arts.sum: Follow the action and join the debate as Norwich City host Oxford United at Carrow Road this evening.

arts.ttl: Johannes Hoff Thorup eyeing Norwich City summer deal for Aston Villa talent
arts.sum: Norwich City boss Johannes Hoff Thorup has confirmed his interest in bringing Lewis Dobbin back to the club… The post Johannes Hoff Thorup eyeing Norwich City summer deal for Aston Villa talent appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: How Oxford United are supporting female fans, staff and players
arts.sum: TOMORROW will be International Women’s Day, and Oxford United Supporters’ Panel fan representative and Her Game Too ambassador Grace Bailey has been looking ahead to this weekend.

arts.ttl: Cameron Brannagan unmoved when it comes to U’s individual records
arts.sum: CAMERON Brannagan isn’t letting individual records get in the way of winning games for Oxford United.

arts.ttl: Iwan Roberts: 'Norwich have got to be winning these two games, especially Oxford'
arts.sum: Norwich City columnist Iwan Roberts admits he is reluctant to give his predictions for the Canaries next two home games - after what happened last time!

arts.ttl: 'Explosive' Aston Villa attacker ruled out for the season after 'unfortunate' injury
arts.sum: Aston Villa attacker Lewis Dobbin won't play for loan club Norwich City again this season after suffering a serious calf injury in their 1-1 draw with Blackburn Rovers last weekend. Aston Villa loanee Lewis Dobbin, who started the season at West Brom, picked up the injury playing for Norwich City
